Package model.players

Class Goalkeeper

java.lang.Object
model.players.GamePlayer
model.players.Goalkeeper
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<GamePlayer>
public class Goalkeeper
extends GamePlayer
This class extends GamePlayer and represents the goalkeeper of the game.
